verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"You shall also <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H376>'Any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> or from the <S%H1616>aliens<s%> <S%H1481>sojourning<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of his <S%H2233>offspring<s%> to <S%H4432>Molech,<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death;<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H68>stones.<s%>

'I will also <S%H5414>set<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H376>man<s%> and will <S%H3772>cut<s%> him <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of his <S%H2233>offspring<s%> to <S%H4432>Molech,<s%> <S%H4616>so<s%> as to <S%H2930>defile<s%> My <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> and to <S%H2455>profane<s%> My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%>

<S%H518>'If<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> however, should <S%H5956>ever<s%> <S%H5956>disregard<s%> <S%H5869><s%> that <S%H376>man<s%> when he <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of his <S%H2233>offspring<s%> to <S%H4432>Molech,<s%> so as not to <S%H4191>put<s%> him to <S%H4191>death,<s%>

then I <S%H589>Myself<s%> will <S%H7760>set<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H376>man<s%> and against his <S%H4940>family;<s%> and I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H5971>people<s%> both him and <S%H3605>all<s%> those who <S%H2181>play<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, by <S%H2181>playing<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4432>Molech.<s%>

'As for the <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6437>turns<s%> to <S%H178>mediums<s%> and to <S%H3049>spiritists,<s%> to <S%H2181>play<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, I will also <S%H5414>set<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H5315>person<s%> and will <S%H3772>cut<s%> him <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
'You shall <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> yourselves therefore and be <S%H6918>holy,<s%> for I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
'And you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and <S%H6213>practice<s%> them; I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H6942>sanctifies<s%> you.

<S%H3588>'If<s%> [there is] <S%H376>anyone<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7043>curses<s%> his father or his <S%H1>mother,<s%> he shall <S%H517>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death;<s%> he has <S%H4191>cursed<s%> his father or his <S%H7043>mother,<s%> his <S%H1>bloodguiltiness<s%> is upon him.

'If [there is] a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5003>commits<s%> <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with another man's <S%H802>wife,<s%> one <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5003>commits<s%> <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with his friend's <S%H802>wife,<s%> the <S%H5003>adulterer<s%> and the <S%H5003>adulteress<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

'If [there is] a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> with his father's <S%H802>wife,<s%> he has <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his father's <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death,<s%> their <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness<s%> is upon them.

'If [there is] a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> with his daughter-in-law, <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death;<s%> they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8397>incest,<s%> their <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness<s%> is upon them.

'If [there is] a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> with a <S%H2145>male<s%> as those who <S%H4904>lie<s%> with a <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them have <S%H6213>committed<s%> a <S%H8441>detestable<s%> <S%H8441>act;<s%> they shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%> Their <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness<s%> is upon them.

'If [there is] a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3947>marries<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> and her <S%H517>mother,<s%> it is <S%H2154>immorality;<s%> both he and they shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> that there may be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2154>immorality<s%> in your <S%H8432>midst.<s%>

'If [there is] a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5414>lies<s%> <S%H7903><s%> with an <S%H929>animal,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death;<s%> you shall also <S%H2026>kill<s%> the <S%H929>animal.<s%>

'If [there is] a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7126>approaches<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H929>animal<s%> to <S%H7250>mate<s%> with it, you shall <S%H2026>kill<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> and the <S%H929>animal;<s%> they shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%> Their <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness<s%> is upon them.

'If [there is] a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3947>takes<s%> his <S%H269>sister,<s%> his father's <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his mother's <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> so that he <S%H7200>sees<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> and she <S%H7200>sees<s%> his <S%H6172>nakedness,<s%> it is a <S%H9155>disgrace;<s%> and they shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of their <S%H5971>people.<s%> He has <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his sister's <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> he <S%H5375>bears<s%> his <S%H5771>guilt.<s%>

'If [there is] a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> with a <S%H1739>menstruous<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> and <S%H1540>uncovers<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness,<s%> he has <S%H6168>laid<s%> <S%H6168>bare<s%> her <S%H7426>flow,<s%> and she has <S%H1540>exposed<s%> the <S%H7426>flow<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood;<s%> thus <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H5971>people.<s%>

'You shall also not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your mother's <S%H269>sister<s%> or of your father's <S%H269>sister,<s%> for such a one has <S%H6168>made<s%> <S%H6168>naked<s%> his <S%H7607>blood<s%> <S%H7607>relative;<s%> they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>guilt.<s%>

'If [there is] a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> with his uncle's <S%H1733>wife<s%> he has <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his uncle's <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H2399>sin.<s%> They shall <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H6185>childless.<s%>

'If [there is] a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3947>takes<s%> his brother's <S%H802>wife,<s%> it is <S%H5079>abhorrent;<s%> he has <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his brother's <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%> They shall be <S%H6185>childless.<s%>

'You are therefore to <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them, so that the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H935>bringing<s%> you to <S%H3427>live<s%> will not <S%H9513>spew<s%> you out.

'Moreover, you shall not <S%H1980>follow<s%> the <S%H2708>customs<s%> of the <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I shall <S%H7971>drive<s%> out <S%H6440>before<s%> you, for they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things,<s%> and therefore I have <S%H6973>abhorred<s%> them.

'Hence I have <S%H559>said<s%> to you, "You are to <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H127>land,<s%> and I <S%H589>Myself<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> it to you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>" I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H914>separated<s%> you from the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>

'You are therefore to <S%H914>make<s%> a <S%H914>distinction<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>animal<s%> and the <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H5775>bird<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean;<s%> and you shall not <S%H8262>make<s%> <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> <S%H8262>detestable<s%> by <S%H929>animal<s%> or by <S%H5775>bird<s%> or by <S%H3605>anything<s%> that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H127>ground,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H914>separated<s%> for you as <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>
'Thus you are to be <S%H6918>holy<s%> to Me, for I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> am <S%H6918>holy;<s%> and I have <S%H914>set<s%> you <S%H914>apart<s%> from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> to be Mine.

'Now a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> who is a <S%H178>medium<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H3049>spiritist<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%> They shall be <S%H7275>stoned<s%> with <S%H68>stones,<s%> their <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness<s%> is upon them.' "
